INSERT INTO so_package_item(
so_package_id,
order_code,
parent_order_code,
user_id,
merchant_id,
product_id,
mp_id,
warehouse_id,
product_item_amount,
product_price_final,

product_price_original,

product_price_sale,
product_tax_amount,

product_type,
amount_share_coupon,
amount_share_promotion,
amount_share_delivery_fee,
amount_share_delivery_fee_accounting,
product_gross_weight,
vehicle_warranty,
delivery_time,
delivery_method,
violation_responsibility,
source_id,
code,
unit,
place_of_origin,
excise_tax_amount,
increment_tax_amount,
customs_duties_amount,
ext_info,
so_item_id,
update_time,
create_time,
platform_id,
sku_id,
) VALUES (
#{soPackageId},
#{orderCode},
#{parentOrderCode},
#{userId},
#{merchantId},
#{productId},
#{mpId},

#{productItemAmount},

mapper.update:
UPDATE so_package_item
so_package_id = #{soPackageId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
parent_order_code = #{parentOrderCode},
user_id = #{userId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
product_id = #{productId},
mp_id = #{mpId},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId},
product_item_amount = #{productItemAmount},
product_price_final = #{productPriceFinal},
product_item_num = #{productItemNum},
product_item_out_num = #{productItemOutNum},
product_cname = #{productCname},
product_ename = #{productEname},
product_pic_path = #{productPicPath},
product_version_no = #{productVersionNo},
product_sale_type = #{productSaleType},
product_price_original = #{productPriceOriginal},
product_price_market = #{productPriceMarket},
product_price_sale = #{productPriceSale},
product_tax_amount = #{productTaxAmount},
buy_type = #{buyType},
product_type = #{productType},
amount_share_coupon = #{amountShareCoupon},
amount_share_promotion = #{amountSharePromotion},
amount_share_delivery_fee = #{amountShareDeliveryFee},
amount_share_delivery_fee_accounting = #{amountShareDeliveryFeeAccounting},
product_gross_weight = #{productGrossWeight},
vehicle_warranty = #{vehicleWarranty},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime},
delivery_method = #{deliveryMethod},
violation_responsibility = #{violationResponsibility},
source_id = #{sourceId},
code = #{code},
unit = #{unit},
place_of_origin = #{placeOfOrigin},
excise_tax_amount = #{exciseTaxAmount},
increment_tax_amount = #{incrementTaxAmount},
customs_duties_amount = #{customsDutiesAmount},
ext_info = #{extInfo},
so_item_id = #{soItemId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
WHERE id = #{id}
